mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM host WHERE host_address = #{host_address}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host (member_email, host_address, host_type, host_intro, host_price, host_capacity) VALUES (#{member_email},#{host_address},#{host_type},#{host_intro},#{host_price},#{host_capacity})
mapper.select: SELECT host_num FROM host WHERE member_email = #{member_email} ORDER BY host_num DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host_images (host_num, img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6) VALUES (#{host_num}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5}, #{img6})
